abstract: For World Food Day, learning about global hunger in a lesson developed with the United Nations World Food Programme.
snippet: For World Food Day, learning about global hunger in a lesson developed with the United Nations World Food Programme.
lead_paragraph: World Food Day falls on Oct. 16 (Sunday) this year. It is a worldwide event intended to increase awareness, understanding and informed year-round action to fight hunger around the world.

headline.main: World Food Day: Addressing Hunger Around the Globe
